name: microfrontends-in-action-demos
description: A collection of isolated microfrontend example projects (module federation, single-spa, web components) under examples/.
author: Alexandros Tsichouridis

scripts.start: echo "This repository hosts multiple examples under examples/. Navigate into an example and run its scripts."
scripts.build: echo "Nothing to build at the root. Go into an example (e.g., examples/module-federation) and run its build script."
scripts.test: echo "No root tests. Each example should define its own tests."
scripts.lint: echo "No root linter configured. Lint per example."
scripts.mf:install:all: npm run mf:install:host && npm run mf:install:header && npm run mf:install:catalog && npm run mf:install:details && npm run mf:install:cart-orders
scripts.mf:dev:all: concurrently "npm run mf:dev:host" "npm run mf:dev:header" "npm run mf:dev:catalog" "npm run mf:dev:details" "npm run mf:dev:cart-orders"
scripts.mf:build:all: npm run mf:build:host && npm run mf:build:header && npm run mf:build:catalog && npm run mf:build:details && npm run mf:build:cart-orders
